solid-instagram-access-token-form.title: Access token
solid-instagram-access-token-form.info: Wondering how to get an access token? See our manual in the Shopware Store.

alert.successTesting: Yee-haw! Your access token is valid.
alert.successRefreshing: Refreshing! Successfully renewed your access token. Don't forget to Save!
alert.refreshHint: To finish the setup and activate the automatic renewal of your token you have to refresh it once manually. To do so, click Refresh access token and Save afterwards.

status.400: Your acceess token does not seem to be valid.
